title: Clean and manage Sanger sequences from raw files to aligned consensus
questions: How to clean Sanger sequencing files?
objectives: Learn how to manage sequencing files (AB1, FASTQ, FASTA)
Learn how to clean your Sanger sequences in an automated and reproducible way
key_points: Check your data and results for mistakes afterward !!!! This procedure is useful but not perfect

workflows.name: Sanger1 : From AB1 to aligned consensus and primers fasta + BLAST
workflows.title: Sanger1 : From AB1 to aligned consensus and primers fasta + BLAST

workflows.name: Training Sanger sequences CHD8
workflows.title: Training Sanger sequences CHD8
